title: The Role of Nuclear Power in Climate Change Mitigation: A Comprehensive Review
abstract: This paper examines the potential of nuclear power as a low-carbon energy source in the context of global climate change mitigation efforts. We analyze lifecycle emissions, safety records, economic factors, and public perception across 47 countries.

title: Artificial Intelligence and the Future of Work: Job Displacement vs. Job Creation
abstract: This study provides empirical analysis of AI's impact on employment across 23 industries in developed economies. We find nuanced effects: while 14% of current jobs face high automation risk, AI is projected to create 12 million new roles by 2030.

title: Modern Nuclear Reactor Safety: Lessons from Three Decades of Operation
abstract: Analysis of safety incidents and near-misses across 440 operational nuclear reactors worldwide. We find that modern Gen III+ designs show a 94% reduction in incident rates compared to older designs.
